price: Kuma zuwa ga Ãdãwa, (Mun aika) ɗan'uwansu Hũdu. Ya ce: "Yã kũ mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah. Ba ku da wani abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Ba ku kasance ba fãce kunã mãsu ƙirƙirãwa.
arabic: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۖ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا مُفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilā ʿādin akhāhum hūdan qāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu in antum illā muf'tarūna
